CustomObject.description:
This custom setting holds the exception scenarios for account team assignment
The logic for the custom setting can be read like this: 'Match the Partner_Id__c, check the Value in the Account_field__c, and if there is a match, do not assign the Team_Role__c.' Example for row AM-Medical: 'If the partner id is for BCBS Florida, and the Account.LSV_Business__c field = 'Medical Only', then do not assign the Team Role of 'AccountManager'.
CustomObject.label: Account Team Assignment Exception
